Recipe.Name: AutorouteBlogs
Recipe.Description: Adds Autoroute functionality to an existing blog
Recipe.Author: The Orchard Team

Orchard.Command: autoroute create "Blog" "Title" "{Content.Slug}" "http://website.com/my-blog" true autoroute create "BlogPost" "Date and Title" "{Content.Date.Format:yyyy}/{Content.Date.Format:MM}/{Content.Date.Format:dd}/{Content.Slug}" "http://website.com/2011/05/12/a-blog-post" true
